Reviews.Title: A great cheap phone!
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: I love that it is very lightweight, and durable. You can also buy cases for it too which is even better. The speaker is very loud which is good if you left it in the other room. The numbers are a bit too large for me, but it works okay. Isn't an easy phone to text on, but I'm sure ill get the hang of it. The only bad thing I have to say about the Coast, is when you flip it open, its a bit too long. They could have made the screen smaller. This is your everyday basic phone. The 2 megapixel camera isn't that bad, but isn't great. You can't expect too much for $20.00. All in all, I would say it is worth your money, and very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Glad to see a flip phone for boost Mobile.
Reviews.Author: Mary Brasel
Reviews.Content: I give this an A+++++ Glad to see a flip phone for people that only make call's. I bought this for a person that only make's & receives incoming call's. Company's are all about New Smart phone's.. They forget that not all people can read or write..

Reviews.Title: great basic phone
Reviews.Author: dalin
Reviews.Content: this is easy to use and easy to see. perfect for a basic phone user. The backlighting is very nice to make it easier to see (can be dimmed as you like of course). the buttons are soft to the touch and large enough to be easily used by anyone with finger or hand problems. the outside is not slick and has a slight texture for easy grip. the menus are not complicated. contacts are a bit of a challenge to put in due to how the typing of letters are keyed. but this is not a deal breaker for this phone. battery seems to be reliable for the few days I have owned this phone. boost mobile set-up is easy. boost mobile website is not complicated and is easy to navigate. Service areas are good even in the mountains of WNC. I do wish there was a way to turn off emergency alerts since the beep in the middle of the night can be disconcerting. but some people might want this. if you are into fashion, amazon offers pretty and colorful covers for this phone at under $5.00 including shipping. My most recent other phone was a sanyo katana which was several years old which is my comparison for the Kyocera coast. Kyocera offers the same phone with a different name through the virgin mobile service. of many basic phones I evaluated this was the best for simple uncomplicated use. in my research I discovered that the biggest players in mobile services do offer basic phones but do not have them in stock and the display phones are often not even the same as the ones available. I also found that the largest of companies just did not want to deal with someone who only wanted a basic phone as opposed to a smart phone (they also had the poorest quality basic phone). so do yourself a favor and don't bother with going to the "store fronts" - get your BASIC phone at amazon and choose a simple plan from your carrier of choice. Also be cautious of set-up of your phone if you go to a big box store. if they do it incorrectly it is a big inconvenience to get them to fix it (they will fix it or accept a return with some prodding). amazon and boost make it all easy with a great basic phone.

Reviews.Title: Good Not Great
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: I've been using this phone for about a month now and it's just okay. So far:Pros:1) Big key pad for those who need it2) Performs basic functions decently3) Call quality is good when not on speakerphone, when using headphones, or when using my Bluetooth earpieceCons:1) No dial tone when I make calls sometimes2) Speaker phone makes it hard for me to be heard and for me to hear3) Too long of a flip phone4) Doesn't connect to my car's Bluetooth for some reasonI got this phone for $19.99 so I wasn't expecting much. My LG Rumor Reflex kept malfunctioning every couple of months so I'd have to send it in to LG. I was looking for a reliable phone and so far so good but only time will tell.

Reviews.Title: KYOCERA COAST PHONE BATTERY ISSUE
Reviews.Author: 3PC
Reviews.Content: The phone is great except for one thing: the battery.  The specs for this phone say 6 hours of operation.  I've lived with 2 hours of operation since 2004, so I was really looking forward to 6 hours (!!).  I am barely getting one hour.So that was the shyster nation deal on this phone.  Purchase it cheap on-line (shipped by Detroit Packing Compan), and then have to spend an additional $15 - 20 dollars to get a battery that would (maybe) live up to the specs.

Reviews.Title: good phone for the price
Reviews.Author: R0L1AM "R0L1AM"
Reviews.Content: I like the phone, it's light and affordable. The only thing is it can't be connected to the computer. I have this ringtone I really like but can't use because I can't connect to the computer..other than that it is good.

Reviews.Title: Love this little phone!!
Reviews.Author: Pauline McIntyre
Reviews.Content: I love my Kyocera phone,it is just what I needed. love  the great pics it takes. has big numbers  thanks

Reviews.Title: Kyocera Coast Prepaid (Boost Mobile)
Reviews.Author: Vee H.
Reviews.Content: I love, love, love this phone. It feels so nice, and the size is medium with a great fit in my hand. I can see the numbers and screen clearly. This phone is easy to use and works nicely. This was a good purchase. I am a flip phone lover.

Reviews.Title: Used
Reviews.Author: Ash
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone as a gift, and when they got the phone they tried to activate it and it turns out the phone had already been used and activated at one point and it charged them $10 to re activate it. I am not satisfied with this product.

Reviews.Title: Great little phone.
Reviews.Author: Peter J. Schiffbauer Jr. "Pedro Perakis"
Reviews.Content: This phone does everything it is supposed to.  I always have a signal.  I have never had a dropped call.  The camera works well for what it is.  I can send pictures to other peoples cell phones and I can receive pictures mails.  I can text well with this phone and I can receive texts and emails on this phone.  I use the calender a lot to schedule appointments and it notifies me with an alarm.  Great phone.

Reviews.Title: Happy Mom
Reviews.Author: Gwendolyn Abair
Reviews.Content: love it mom is happy with the large numbers and the flip cellphone. she is really please with her new cellphone

Reviews.Title: Good phone for basic voice use
Reviews.Author: nadesico81
Reviews.Content: This is a decent flip phone for Boost Mobile. Kyocera has been making low to middle end phones for years for Boost Mobile aka Sprint Pre paid. This phone is good if your not interested in any of the advanced services Boost Mobile has to offer. It's good for people who want a decent middle to high end flip phone with a decent amount of features. My business uses pre paid phones all the time for short term communications over the course of a few days to a week. We started using the lowest end pre paid phones we could find from ATT. While the calling was fine the phone it's self was difficult to navigate and use. The Kyocera uses Sprints standard interface for feature phones which is simple and easy to use. It's literally point, scroll and click using the middle pad. The good thing about Boost mobile is if the phone goes without minuets for over 30 days you will loose the phone number. I know that sounds bad but it cost nothing to re activate the phone with a new number. ATT charges 10 bucks for a new sim card if your phone number expires.Pros:It has 2 dollar a day unlimited use or 35 bucks a month unlimited use.Very large screen for the price point compared to other prepaid flip phones.Large outer screenLong battery lifeComes with some basic apps installed like facebook and twitterOnline activation is crazy easy and simple.Boost Mobile online account manager is nice and simple to use.You can re fill the phone from the phone it's self which is a added bonus.Cons:Flimsy back coverSpotty coverage outside of populated areas (This is over all the case for Boost Mobile)This phone will not roam in CanadaBasic plastic casing could use some improvementFor the money this phone is a solid buy. Most places sell it for 29.99 or more. If you can find it for less then your getting a deal. If your in the Boost Mobile coverage area and need a basic flip phone for just talk and limited texting and apps then this phone is for you.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: jessica. joyce
Reviews.Content: love my new phone no email on it but love and so many things on to use besides email love this need a new phone and can not see very good or very good this is your phone  p.s. love this phone myself

Reviews.Title: My Kyocera
Reviews.Author: Tracey Tuttle
Reviews.Content: I chose this cell phone because it was cheap and i needed a phone. However it is a handy phone. I would suggest this  phone to others.

Reviews.Title: Good phone for what it cost
Reviews.Author: yari100
Reviews.Content: Good basic phone, big screen and numbers decent camera. I bought it for someone esle who is not great with technology so a smartphone would be to confusing for them and not needed if they were just going to make phone calls. I think it works great when I tried it. However, they have been having some problems with the phone; like sometimes they other person they are calling can't hear them, speed dail issues. So I'm going to give this phone a 3 for now, time will tell.

Reviews.Title: I am very pleased with my new Kyocera Coast prepaid cell phone.  It suits me for emergency calls mostly while in travel,
Reviews.Author: Tena Redding
Reviews.Content: affordable pay as you go 90 day re-boost plan, if chosen.  Large numbers to better see to dial, text, and/ email messages, and recieve. Easy to operate,and to activate.  Camera included. Battery power holds up for several hours.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: great low tech Phone
Reviews.Author: FL Girl
Reviews.Content: We were looking for an easy to use low tech phone. One that you can text with and one that has larger keys than some phones today. The best thing is NO pocket dialing. Price is right and the sound quality is good. Pictures are ok...I'm not an photo expert by any means. IF you don't want a lot of bells and whistles then this is what you seek

Reviews.Title: LOVE!
Reviews.Author: Shelbie Johnston
Reviews.Content: LOVE this phone, I don't need all the bells and whistles people who text etc need, I need a reliable, easy to use phone and this is it!! Love Boost Mobile and love this phone, no regrets!

Reviews.Title: good little phone
Reviews.Author: Arky
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for an inexpensive flip phone then this is it.  I bought this for my son because he keeps losing his. Plain and simple to use.  I would recommend this phone

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: carolyn
Reviews.Content: This phone works great! Very good price and it looks great. Works just fine. It seems like a good made phone.

Reviews.Title: kyocera coast
Reviews.Author: pam
Reviews.Content: This phone has poor sound quality.  It is a cheap, cheap basic flip phone that I would not recommend to anyone. .

Reviews.Title: bad phone
Reviews.Author: jackilynl
Reviews.Content: It has no reception and sound quality is horrible.  But u get what u pay forCouldn't really expect anything less

Reviews.Title: works well
Reviews.Author: Camwi
Reviews.Content: For a cheap, non-smart phone this phone works very well.  It's definitely a bit 'old school' but it is pretty user friendly and great to have on hand for a backup when your smart phone dies!

Reviews.Title: I have never used the phone
Reviews.Author: Chris Smith "cx2smith"
Reviews.Content: It appears well made and has everything needed for use except credit for airtime. I was looking for a travel phone where I could replace the sim card when in other countries. It was really inexpensive so I bought it. Problem is it has no sim card and is not suitable for any use other than the US. Completely my fault for not researching better. It still appears to be a good phone with big buttons and a big display.

Reviews.Title: Be careful what you buy
Reviews.Author: d1rtg1rl
Reviews.Content: I thought I could replace the phone I got for free with the same brand, not so I ended up sending it back for credit even though it was only $12  dollars. It matters what plan you are on in my case. The phone was probably great.

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: Miyosha Curry
Reviews.Content: These phones were a GREAT gift for my younger sisters ages 9 and 11 they absolutely love them!! I didn't expect them to look as good as they did. It has a nice size screen and huge buttons. I caught them on sale for 4.99 during the cyber Monday sale BEST 4.99 I've ever spent!!

Reviews.Title: great phonr
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It is a great phone for how cheap it is. It does everything that a phone should do like text, take pictures, and make phone calls.  I am liking this phone.

Reviews.Title: not bad,small phone
Reviews.Author: elchoya
Reviews.Content: not bad phone ,I don't see me having this for long.pretty sturdy built,says on description camera with video capabilitys.no video on this phone.also says 2gb micro sd card included,no sd card included.nuff said.

Reviews.Title: It's a phone.
Reviews.Author: Howard Blauer
Reviews.Content: I don't need or want a smart phone. I was looking for a reasonably priced phone. Having recently bought this same model for my wife and using it several times, I was satisfied that it would meet my needs. And the price was right!Having received and activated the phone, I am satisfied with my purchase and how quickly I received it.

Reviews.Title: Phone
Reviews.Author: T. Franklin II
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my kids so I could talk to them whenever I wanted but not give them too much freedom with the internet and stuff. It's easy to use for them and they haven't broken it yet so its durable and the service is good too.

Reviews.Title: phone is good but no SIM card slot
Reviews.Author: Nik
Reviews.Content: Bought this thinking it has a SIM card slot but it doesn't. I bought it on Black Friday for $6 so not much loss.

Reviews.Title: BEST PHONE FOR THE OLDER FOLKS!
Reviews.Author: Mr. Natural "Randy"
Reviews.Content: This is a WONDERFUL phone!  For those with diminished eyesight or hearing, it offers a superb LARGE font and a very LOUD speaker and earphone.  The buttons are LARGE and LIGHTED, the camera is a good one, the build quality is excellent, and Sprint service is good.  It also has lanyard holes near the BOTTOM of the phone ... the ONLY phone I've found with this sensible design.  You want to NEVER lose or drop your phone again?  Get a neck lanyard and use it!This phone is identical to the Kyocera Kona (Virgin Mobile) except the Kona has a red background for some screens instead of a black one.  Earlier phones with all the same features but a weaker camera were the Sanyo Vero and Sanyo Mirro (both with Sprint itself).  My family still uses the Mirro and Vero, and they are superb!  This Coast and the Kona are even BETTER!

Reviews.Title: Coasting Along with Boost
Reviews.Author: P. Vu
Reviews.Content: I did not buy this phone from Amazon but I will give my "2-cent worth".  First the phone has bigger screens inside and out than any other CDMA flip/slider phones from Sprint.  But bigger screens will come with a bigger form factor, comparably to Samsung Factor and thicker as well.  The phone has pretty much the same functions as any other feature phones from Sprint, including Voice Command from Nuance.  So I can make calls while driving with no need to dial or looking up contacts, except pronouncing their names to the Voice Command.  I like the big raised buttons and not arrays close to each other.  But one thing I do not like about the phone is its keys/buttons feedback.  They take some force to press, unlike Samsung Factor's.  I would still prefer this phone over Factor because of its bigger screens factor.

Reviews.Title: Nice basic phone
Reviews.Author: Joe046 "Joe"
Reviews.Content: Great for the price.  Bought it on sale for 20 bucks.Doesn't have drivers available, so somewhat cumbersome to get pictures onto computer.  But cant complain too much for $19.99.Arrived promptly, and was easily activated.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Kyocera phone
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Harnish
Reviews.Content: Outstanding service only one day late the screen is big and is the best prepaid flip phone I have ever seenwonderful and outstanding service  arrived in outstanding conditionThanks Jeremy

Reviews.Title: Meh.  It's a phone, it mostly works.
Reviews.Author: Joshua Gramlich "Joshua Gramlich"
Reviews.Content: It's a $30 phone.  You get what you pay for.  I downgraded from a Samsung Galaxy Nexus (temporarily) while I investigate the relative usefulness of other networks and get away from paying Verizon a ridiculous $120 a month.  The Nexus is brilliant, and when I find an acceptable network to use, I'll be getting another or one of it's cousins.  It absolutely never dropped calls even in terrible network access areas (like where I live).  I couldn't get 3g or 4g signal very well on my GNexus/Verizon setup, but it would never drop calls.  My HTC Incredible had similar issues, but not as bad as this Coast phone.Though I'm on a different network with Boost, the towers each network operate from are the same.  I can pretty much make a network map of my home based on the signal meter (and other) behavior of each of the three phones.  They're all weak in the same places, strong (ish) in the same places, so I have no doubts as to the similarity of the networks.The Coast is easily the worst of the three phones in terms of signal and reception.  I can make it work as long as I don't go in the bad places.  I'm not complaining, really, as the phone was bought to use for a month and be done, and I'll be switching it out to a T-Mobile or AT&T; network burner next, but if you're planning on using this phone, check your options.  If you've always got 4 bars, you'll be fine, and it's a capable dumb phone.  It does what they all do and it makes phone calls.  Texting is equally as horrible on this phone as it is on any other dumb phone.If all you want is a phone that works and you are always in a strong cell phone network area, you could do worse.

Reviews.Title: BOOST.. a carrier for people who do zero research on cell carriers and are vulnerable to primitive sales tactics
Reviews.Author: Maxzis
Reviews.Content: Bottom Line: Boost phones have drastically less features than carriers like Tracfone, Cricket, AT&T; NET10, Virgin, T-Mobile, at at-least double the subscription cost. If Tracfone makes more sense than you that's bad..My parents have been subscribed through the local Boost store for about 4 years. My mother just got this exact phone today for $20. She was told it was a deal by the sales person while she was making her outrageous $50 payment. Funny thing is, it has literally no difference from her old phone, in the subscription or phone features. She basically wasted $20 on a service she is already spending too much on..Another Reason Boost and their phones are bad: Every ~3 months they find a new feature to remove from their phones. Last month it was GPS; which is next to worthless anyway because these phones are all based on legacy Java->J2ME at best, and it's not even a network feature. Not long before that they removed some other feature. Also, I've yet to see a Boost phone you didn't have to pay for MMS or Data to get your pictures off of. Because they all have their microUSB ports firmware locked, Bluetooth has the contacts feature if even that, and none of the phones have a media card like microSD.Use your brain, you'll save money, get better rates, get drastically more features, using just about anything except this carrier..

Reviews.Title: Even for the low price, Not worth it...
Reviews.Author: mitchell green
Reviews.Content: I switched from a smartphone to this and was very disappointed. It performs poorly and switches off anytime I erase old text messages. Even at $20.00 not worth it if it doesn't work...

Reviews.Title: Unable to send picture mail
Reviews.Author: Ms. Terri
Reviews.Content: This phone does not have enough umph to be able to send pictures, even after I had re-sized them.  I do not recommend this phone unless you don't care about sending a pic.

Reviews.Title: Just isnt my kind of phone..
Reviews.Author: endwatcher "~End"
Reviews.Content: Dislike it.Just not my style.Im sure its great for others though.This is my seven more words needed

ProductInfo.Features:
2MP Digital Camera w/ Video
Dual Displays: 2.4? Internal + External Caller ID
SMS & Multimedia Messaging
Email & IM Capable
What's Included: Handset, charger, activation kit, battery, user guide, 2GB SD card
ProductInfo.Name: Kyocera Coast Prepaid Phone (Boost Mobile)
